body:
I feel very embarrassed, @mattn was totally right in his first comment, the issue was that in my own code, I was using `path.Dir` instead of `filepath.Dir` which didn't behave as expected. I was then testing on linux and OS X and didn't re-crosscompile to test until right now. 

I'm extremely sorry to have wasted everybody's time but I'll take this opportunity to mention that I'm very thankful to all of you for being so kind and helpful.
